briefdescription.para: The name of the program.
Version major.
Version minor.
If the program is in debug mode.
If you show the textures or not.
The path of the icon.
A vector with all Objects of the game.
A vector with all Entity of the game.
A vector with all Light of the game.
A vector with all Light of all the Part.
The ShaderManager of the Game.
A RenderWindow to draw and show the Game.
The color of the background.
A vector defining the gravity.
The World where the Bodies move.
The time step for b2box.
Param for b2box, increase it and perfomance will drops but quality will grows.
Idem.
Constructor deleted.

detaileddescription.para:
This constructor is deleted.
Game(std::string name, int version_Major, int version_minor, bool debug, bool textureOn, std::string icon, ShaderManager* shaderManager, sf::Color& bgColor, b2Vec2& gravity, float timeStep = 1.f / 60.f, int32 velocityIt = 6, int32 positionIt = 3)

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string name, int version_Major, int version_minor, bool debug, bool textureOn, std::string icon, ShaderManager *shaderManager, sf::Color &bgColor, b2Vec2 &gravity, float timeStep=1.f/60.f, int32 velocityIt=6, int32 positionIt=3)
memberdef.name: Game

briefdescription.para: Default Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
The main and default Constructor.
name
(std::string) The name of the Game.
version_Major
(int) The version major of the Game (v.Major.minor).
version_minor
(int) The version minor of the Game (v.Major.minor).
debug
(bool) Define if the Game is in debug mode.
textureOn
(bool) Define if the texture will be drawed.
icon
(std::string) The path to the icon.
shaderManager
(ShaderManager* ) The ShaderManager of the Game.
ShaderManager
bgColor
(sf::Color&) The color of the background.
gravity
(b2Vec2&) The force of gravity which is applied in th Game.
timeStep
(float) The time step between to frame.
velocityIt
(int32) A param for Box2D. Increase it and the quality will be increase but the performance will drops.
b2World::Step
positionIt
(int32) A param for Box2D. Increase it and the quality will be increase but the performance will drops.
b2World::Step

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Returns the name + the version.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the title ie. the name + the version (if you want it).
showVersion
(bool) If you want the version in the title.
(std::string) The title.

briefdescription.para: Switchs between debug and release.
Adds an Object to the game.
Adds an Entity to the game.
Adds an Light to the game.
Removes an Object of the game.
Removes an Entity of the game.
Removes an Light of the game.
Draws Object, Entity, Light and sf::Shader.

detaileddescription.para: Draws Objects, Entity, Light and Shader on m_window().

briefdescription.para: A class that contains yours Object, Entity, Light and ShaderManager.

detaileddescription.para: Game contains infos about your project (name, version, debug/release mode, etc...) and your Object, Entity, Light and Shader (in a ShaderManager). This class draws everything on the window too.
